title: Display serif logotype — please help identify, thanks
content:
Hello,  
Any of you bright sparks able to get this little number?  
Thanks a lot in advance....  
Ed

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415083850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-03-05%20at%2015_6041.23.59.png)
author: TypoBeac

comments.content:
|CARMEN| appears to be custom. You could modify something like Schiller Antiqua to mimic the look:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/schiller-antiqua-rr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415083850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/schiller-antiqua-rr/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/schiller-antiqua-rr/")

The secondary type (Depuis 1875...) appears to be Fell Type, by Hoefler & Co.:  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/historical-allsorts/styles/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415083850/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/historical-allsorts/styles/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/historical-allsorts/styles/")

Thanks kthomps, that's really useful :)  
nice one
